pkgmetadata.longdescription: **motionEye** is a web-based frontend for `motion <https://motion-project.github.io>`_. Check out the `wiki <https://github.com/ccrisan/motioneye/wiki>`_ for more details... image:: https://badges.gitter.im/Join%20Chat.svg :alt: Join the chat at https://gitter.im/ccrisan/motioneye :target: https://gitter.im/ccrisan/motioneye?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=badgeYou can support the development of motionEye by making a small donation... image:: https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donate_LG.gif :alt: [paypal] :target: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=ccrisan%40gmail%2ecom&lc=US&item_name=motionEye&no_note=0&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donate_LG%2egif%3aNonHostedGuest
